text: avara (kalada) devadutaru avarodane helidaru; khanditavagiyu navu nim'mantaha manavaru, adare allahanu tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavara mele upakara toruttane. Allahana appane illade nim'ma balige spastavada puraveyannu (pavadavannu) taralu namage sadhyavilla. Visvasigalu, allahanalli matra bharavase idabeku
